description:
Today we take a look at the life of Celebrían - a life of great love, and great sorrow.  She is the wife of Elrond as well as the daughter of Galadriel and Celeborn.

Hit subscribe and the bell for great Tolkien content every week!

title: The Life of Celebrían (Elrond's Wife) | Tolkien Explained
